sampling_scheme: 5x/day with 4 randomly-timed surveys between 9am and 6pm and one daily evening survey after 7pm
additional_comments: no beep information available; data from the CoCo project; subset of all data available here; more information about all data and a data request sheet is provided at https://osf.io/bzahp/ and https://coco-study.org/en/; additional data about tweet counts related to the Ukraine war are available on OSF

features.name: angry
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely

features.name: anxious
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely
features.construct: anxiety, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: sad
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely

features.name: happy
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely

features.name: excited
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely
features.construct: excitement, positive affect, affect, extraversion, big five

features.name: relaxed
features.labels:
1 = not agree at all
2 = disagree
3 = somewhat disagree
4 = somewhat agree
5 = agree
6 = agree completely
features.construct: relaxation, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: feeling_country
features.details:
How positive or negative have you felt towards people in
your country in general today?

features.name: threat_country
features.description: Feeling threatened by people in country
features.details:
How threatened have you felt by people in your country
in general today?
features.labels:
1 = not at all threatened
10 = extremely threatened

features.name: similarity_country
features.description: Feeling similar to people in country
features.details:
How similar have you felt to people in your country in
general today?
features.labels:
1 = not at all similar
10 = extremely similar
